text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text: How will you leave your mark on history?

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
Will the crown of the peerless 
adorn your head?

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text: Will your hands hold the noble shield?

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text: Or do you seek honors yet further beyond?

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
No path is laid before you. 
Shape the future by your own will.

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
On the glorious stage that awaits, only 
the name of the strongest will remain.

text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text:
A place far beyond dreams. 
Dare to stand at the start line.
